intro.description: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of creating a process and opening its diagram.

item.title: The new Process Definition
item.description:
After creating the new model, a default process definition exists, which appears in the tree view below your ACME Workflow Model element. To change it's properties:
1. Switch to the Outline view.
2. Double-click the new process definition to open the properties page.
3. Enter the Name "Support Case Management" and the Id "SupportCaseManagement".
4. Click OK.

item.title: Open the Process Diagram
item.description: After creating the new process definition, it appears in the Outline view and its default diagram will be opened automatically. To open a process diagram explicitly double-click it in the Outline view.
